Description.Name: Tactics
Description.Details: Tactics increases the effectiveness of Called Shot opportunities. It also reduces the penalty for indirect fire and improves the minimum range of weaponry.

temporalSetResult: [[RES_MW,{RES_MW.Callsign}]] has [[DM.SimGameStatDescDefs[SimGameStatDesc_Tactics], Tactics]] set to {RES_VALUE.ToString} for {RES_DURATION.ToString} days
temporalPositiveResult: [[RES_MW,{RES_MW.Callsign}]] has [[DM.SimGameStatDescDefs[SimGameStatDesc_Tactics], Tactics]] increased by {RES_VALUE.ToString} for {RES_DURATION.ToString} days
temporalNegativeResult: [[RES_MW,{RES_MW.Callsign}]] has [[DM.SimGameStatDescDefs[SimGameStatDesc_Tactics], Tactics]] decreased by {RES_VALUE.ToString} for {RES_DURATION.ToString} days
